member.summary: Marker that show does logon already finished. By default is true, cause default logon is anonymous.

member.name: P:PipesProvider.Client.TransmissionLine.Direction
member.summary:
Define bihavior of the client loop.
In - will connect to target pipe as soon as possible. Out - will wait for query in queue.

Set routing instruction to line. Provide access to auto messages encryption with control of keys expiring.
ATTENTION: Line will not change logon config or server data. If you want get full sync with routing instruction then user relative constructor.

member.name: T:PipesProvider.Networking.Routing.Instruction
member.summary:
Struct that contain instruction about target adress by relative query params. Allow using of several servers via one public.
Example: -- Authification server Client -- Query server -- Data server 1 -- Data server 2

member.summary: RSA public key that was recived from this server.

member.name: P:PipesProvider.Networking.Routing.Instruction.PublicKeyExpireTime
member.summary: Time when public key will become expired.

member.name: P:PipesProvider.Networking.Routing.Instruction.IsValid
member.summary: Check does loading was failed or key was expired.

member.summary: Title of this instruction that can be showed in applications.

member.name: F:PipesProvider.Networking.Routing.Instruction.commentary
member.summary: Commentary added to this instruction.

member.name: F:PipesProvider.Networking.Routing.Instruction.routingIP
member.summary: Address that will be ised for routing

member.name: F:PipesProvider.Networking.Routing.Instruction.pipeName
member.summary: neme of the named pipe for server access.

member.name: F:PipesProvider.Networking.Routing.Instruction.logonConfig
member.summary: Logon config recuired to server connection.

member.name: F:PipesProvider.Networking.Routing.Instruction.queryPatterns
member.summary:
Array that contain querie's body that need to be routed by this instruction.
Format: property=value&property=value&... etc. Encount all properties that need to be a part of query by splitting with UniformQueries.API.SPLITTING_SYMBOL ('&' by default). !property - this property must be out of query. $property - this property must exist in query.
targetQueries[0] = "q=GET&sq="PUBLICKEY"; // All queries that contain GET query and PUBLICKEY sub-query will routed. targetQueries[1] = "q=GET&!pk"; // All queries that request data from server but has no RSA public keys for backward encription will wouted. targetQueries[1] = "$customProp"; // All queries that have "customProp" property in query will be routed.

member.name: F:PipesProvider.Networking.Routing.Instruction.RSAEncryption
member.summary: Does this chanel has RSA encryption? If true then client can ask for server's Public Key and encrypt message before send.

member.summary: Return default instruction.

member.name: P:PipesProvider.Networking.Routing.Instruction.Empty
member.summary: Return empty instruction.

member.summary: Check doest this query must be routed using this server instruction.

member.summary: Try to update Public RSA key by query recived from server as reply to GET PUBLICKEY query.

member.summary: Cashed array with found derived types.

Internal level will applyed by default to allow system and application control created pipes.

member.name: T:PipesProvider.Security.SecurityLevel
member.summary: Define requirement to connection.

member.name: F:PipesProvider.Security.SecurityLevel.Anonymous
member.summary: Not require logon. Require Guest user on server. Require allownce to network access via Guest accounts.

member.name: F:PipesProvider.Security.SecurityLevel.RemoteLogon
member.summary: Require authentication via one of the profile on server.

member.name: F:PipesProvider.Security.SecurityLevel.Local
member.summary: Pipe will be accessed only on the local machine.

member.name: F:PipesProvider.Security.SecurityLevel.Administrator
member.summary: access to pipe will provided only for administrators. By default allowed via remote authentication.

member.name: F:PipesProvider.Security.SecurityLevel.Internal
member.summary: pipe will controlled only be server application and system. Any external coonection will be blocked.

Provide base server loop that control pipe. Have ability to full controll all handlers.
Warrning: Use only if undersend how it work. Overwise use simplived ClientToServerLoop or ServerToClientLoop
member.param: GUID that would be used to registration of that pipe.
Delegate that will be called when connection will be established.
Name of pipe that will be used to acces by client.
Dirrection of the possible transmission.
How many server pipes can be started with the same name.
Type of transmission.
Configuration of the pipe.
Security options that would be applied to this pipe.
Handler that will be called in case if transmisssion still not registred. Provide possibility to castom initialization for every type of controller.
